name: Spellbound
description: Spellbound is a virtual reality game which lets you enter into storybooks and be one of the characters. Stop living a boring life, put on your robe and wizard hat, and become a real wizard!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 9 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i7 quad core Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GTX 980 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space
